content:
Over the past 24 hours, the missile troops were affected by 2 air defense, 3 artillery and 1 enemy station.

About thisreported March 24General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

During the day, the Aviation of Defense Forces struck 8 areas of concentration of personnel, weapons and enemy military equipment.

Asreported the armyinform, three howitzers and a mortar position of the enemy were destroyed by Terrobron.
title: Rocket launchers canceled the enemy one station of the Reb and two air defense means
description: This was reported on March 24 by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. During the day...
author: Army Inform
